checkAiObstacleCollision() - Method in class Panels.SnakePanel
Checks for collision between the AI snake and obstacles.
checkCollision(PlayerSnake, List<Obstacle>) - Method in class Objects.Apple
Checks if the apple collides with the snake's head, and if so, increases the snake's length by 1 and generates a new apple.
checkCollisionsBoard() - Method in class Objects.PlayerSnake
Checks if the snake collides with the boundaries of the game board.
checkCollisionSnake(PlayerSnake) - Method in class Objects.PlayerSnake
Checks if the snake collides with another snake.
checkObstacle(List<Obstacle>) - Method in class Objects.Apple
Checks if the apple is obstructed by any obstacle on the game board.
checkObstacleCollision() - Method in class Panels.SnakePanel
Checks for collision between the player snake and obstacles.
checkObstacleSurrounding(List<Obstacle>) - Method in class Objects.Apple
Checks if the apple's surrounding area is obstructed by any obstacle on the game board.
